meanings.definition: A book in which one keeps a daily record of events, experiences, and thoughts.
meanings.sent1: My sister writes in her diary every night before bed.
meanings.sent2: I cherish my old diary filled with memories from my childhood.
meanings.sent3: The diary seemed to have a mind of its own, recording secrets in invisible ink.
meanings.sent4: Her diary was a treasure trove of emotions, like a map of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The worn pages of the diary whispered stories of days long gone.

meanings.definition: A personal record of experiences, thoughts, or feelings kept on a regular basis.
meanings.sent1: Keeping a diary can help you understand your emotions better.
meanings.sent2: She poured her heart into her diary, expressing her deepest fears and joys.
meanings.sent3: The diary was like a loyal friend, always ready to listen without judgment.
meanings.sent4: His diary was a mirror reflecting his innermost thoughts back at him.
meanings.sent5: The diary was a time capsule of her past, preserving moments for the future.
